com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g3d.graphics.particle

Class ParticleEmitter3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g3d.graphics.particle.ParticleEmitter3D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BillboardParticleEmitter, ModelParticleEmitter, PointParticleEmitter

    public class ParticleEmitter3D
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    A simplified method for creating a ParticleSystem.
    Author:
    David/Philip Jerzak (RivelBop)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.particles.batches.ParticleBatch batch
      The batch renderer that will handle rendering the effect added to it and added to system.
      protected com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.particles.ParticleEffect effect
      The particle effect that will be loaded from an assets file and added to system.
      protected com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.particles.ParticleSystem system
      The particle system that will control the effect and batch added to it.

      Initializes a 3D Particle Emitter by simply specifying the batch, asset, camera (if necessary), and loop.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParticleEmitter3D

        public ParticleEmitter3D(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.particles.batches.ParticleBatch aBatch,
                         com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetManager assets,
                         java.lang.String particle,
                         com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Camera camera,
                         boolean loop)
        Initializes a 3D Particle Emitter by simply specifying the batch, asset, camera (if necessary), and loop.
        Parameters:
        aBatch - The batch the particle will be rendered to.
        assets - The asset manager to grab the particle file from.
        particle - The name of the particle file in the asset manager.
        camera - The camera that the particle will be rendered to (not necessary for ModelParticleEmitter).
        loop - Determines if the particle will loop endlessly or not.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.ModelBatch modelBatch)
        Updates and draws the system to the provided ModelBatch.
        Parameters:
        modelBatch - The batch that the particle will be drawn to.

      • getEffect

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.particles.ParticleEffect getEffect()
        Returns:
        The particle effect itself.

      • getSystem

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.particles.ParticleSystem getSystem()
        Returns:
        The particle system associated with the particle effect.

      • getBatch

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.particles.batches.ParticleBatch getBatch()
        Returns:
        The particle batch associated with the particle effect.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Removes the stored ParticleEffect from memory. Should be called if the object is no longer in use.
        Specified by:
        dispose in interface com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
